removeRgroup(Molecule, int) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.StructureParser
mol is changed after this step, make sure to clone it if need to preserve state the first R group with the specifid ID is removed
removeRgroup(Molecule, MolAtom) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.StructureParser
mol is changed after this step, make sure to clone it if need to preserve state It is possible that there are more than one R groups that have the same ID as rgroup
replaceMonomer(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.ComplexNotationParser
This method replace existing monomer with new monomer for a given polymer type in the complex notation
replaceMonomer(String, String, String, String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
This method replaces existing monomer with new monomer in simple polymer notation
